display: 3.5" 960x640 LED-backlit IPS display at 326 ppi (Retina Display)
size: 115.2 mm (4.5 inches) (height), 58.6 mm (2.31 inches) (width), 9.3 mm (0.37 inches) (depth)
battery: Talk time - Up to 8 hours on 3G, Standby time - Up to 200 hours, Internet use - Up to 6 hours on 3G, up to 9 hours on Wi-Fi, Video playback - Up to 10 hours, Audio playback - Up to 40 hours
rear_camera: 8MP with Autofocus and manual focus (Tap to focus), supporting HD 1080p video recording @ 30 FPS
front_camera: VGA photos and 720p videos @ 30 FPS, FaceTime Video Calls supported
